import "./calc.css"; import * as math from "mathjs"; export default function Calc(props) { return (
(document.calc.txt.value = eval( document.calc.txt.value * (Math.PI / 180.0) )) } > Rad (document.calc.txt.value = eval( document.calc.txt.value * (180 / Math.PI) )) } > Deg (document.calc.txt.value = eval( props.myFunction(document.calc.txt.value) )) } > x! (document.calc.txt.value += ")")}>) (document.calc.txt.value += "(")}>( (document.calc.txt.value = eval( Math.trunc(document.calc.txt.value / 10) )) } > CE (document.calc.txt.value = "")}> C (document.calc.txt.value = Math.asin(document.calc.txt.value)) } > aSin (document.calc.txt.value = Math.acos(document.calc.txt.value)) } > aCos (document.calc.txt.value = Math.atan(document.calc.txt.value)) } > aTan (document.calc.txt.value += "**")}>y^x (document.calc.txt.value = Math.log10(document.calc.txt.value)) } > log10 (document.calc.txt.value = eval(Math.log(document.calc.txt.value))) } > ln (document.calc.txt.value += "*")}>* (document.calc.txt.value = Math.sin(document.calc.txt.value)) } > Sin (document.calc.txt.value = Math.cos(document.calc.txt.value)) } > Cos (document.calc.txt.value = Math.tan(document.calc.txt.value)) } > Tan (document.calc.txt.value += "l")}>l (document.calc.txt.value += "o")}>o (document.calc.txt.value += "g")}>g (document.calc.txt.value += "/")}>/ (document.calc.txt.value = Math.PI)}> {"\u03C0"} (document.calc.txt.value = eval(1 / document.calc.txt.value)) } > Inv (document.calc.txt.value = eval(Math.log(document.calc.txt.value))) } > ln (document.calc.txt.value += "4")}>4 (document.calc.txt.value += "5")}>5 (document.calc.txt.value += "6")}>6 (document.calc.txt.value += "-")}>- (document.calc.txt.value += eval(Math.exp(1)))}> e (document.calc.txt.value = eval(Math.sqrt(document.calc.txt.value))) } > {"\u221A"} (document.calc.txt.value += ".")}>. (document.calc.txt.value += "3")}>3 (document.calc.txt.value += "2")}>2 (document.calc.txt.value += "1")}>1 (document.calc.txt.value += "+")}>+ (document.calc.txt.value += "^")}>{"\u2227"} (document.calc.txt.value += "x")}>x (document.calc.txt.value = eval( props.myFunction2(document.calc.txt.value) )) } > d/dx (document.calc.txt.value = eval( props.myFunction3(document.calc.txt.value) )) } > nth root (document.calc.txt.value += ",")}>, (document.calc.txt.value += "0")}>0 (document.calc.txt.value = eval(document.calc.txt.value)) } > =
); }
